org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation
[Groovy] Class BranchRemoveOp

java.lang.Object
  org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation.BranchRemoveOp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable
class BranchRemoveOp

Removes one or more branches from the repository. Returns a list of the fully qualified branch names that were removed.

Remove branches that have been merged.

 def removedBranches = grgit.branch.remove(names: ['the-branch'])
 def removedBranches = grgit.branch.remove(names: ['the-branch', 'other-branch'], force: false)

Remove branches, even if they haven't been merged.

 def removedBranches = grgit.branch.remove(names: ['the-branch'], force: true)
See git-branch Manual Page.
See Also:
Since:
0.2.0

Property Summary
boolean force

If false (the default), only remove branches that are merged into another branch.

java.util.List names

List of all branche names to remove.
